info.name: Doodly.io Dark Theme
info.description: Makes it a bit darker for night play. Only caveat is that you lose any other custom color in chat (i.e. someone guesses the word, someone votekicks, etc.), and player menu doesn't highlight first, second and third rank in colors gold, silver and bronze.
info.additionalInfo:
by orwell with a captial O

Good for night time play.

This is a work in progress and will be enhanced.
